name: The fabric of christmas
description:
How many points of view are there in the celebration of Christmas?... religious, social, commercial... and who knows how many more.

What is true, and what is not... I guess the answer lies within yourself; nobody can tell you this, and you do not need to tell anyone... 

This piece tries to be contemplative, where I hope you loose in your thoughts, scratching what your true Christmas fabric is.
